name: RaraTheme Companion
author: Rara Theme

sections.description:
RaraTheme Companion is truly a must have companion for your website. It provides 23 useful and frequently used widgets that you can add to the sidebars to create an engaging website.

Widgets offered

  1. Advertisement
  2. A Featured Page
  3. Author Bio
  4. Call to Action
  5. Client Logo
  6. Contact
  7. Custom Categories
  8. Facebook Page
  9. FAQs
  10. Featured Post
  11. Icon Text
  12. Image Text
  13. Image
  14. Latest Tweets
  15. Pinterest
  16. Popular Post
  17. Posts Category Slider
  18. Recent Post
  19. Snapchat
  20. Social Media
  21. Stat Counter
  22. Team Member
  23. Testimonial

The plugin works best with themes developed by Rara Theme.

The plugin also provides simple yet clean code which allows developers to overwrite the plugin properties. The plugin offers a multiple numbers of filters and action hooks which for maximum flexibility to the developers.
sections.installation:
Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Navigate to the ‘Plugins> Add New’ in the WordPress dashboard
  2. Click on ‘Upload’ button.
  3. Select raratheme-companion.zip from your computer
  4. Click ‘Install Now’
  5. Activate the plugin from the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download raratheme-companion.zip
  2. Extract the raratheme-companion directory to your computer
  3. Upload the raratheme-companion directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
sections.faq:
What is offered by RaraTheme Companion?

RaraTheme Companion provides 23 different handy widgets for sidebars to create a beautiful website. One can easily overwrite the plugin properties to create designs according to their requirements and needs. A multiple numbers of filters provide flexibility for the developers.
